attributes.action: Bring all world leaders to justice if suspected of war crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of Lord Bingham findings reference Lord Goldsmith report having no hard evidence and fundamently flawed as a manner of justifying resort prior to the Iraq war should Messrs Blair and Bush now stand trial before the World War Crimes Commission?

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
